name: Spells & Secrets - Character Creator
description:
Prepare your wizard student for the release of Spells & Secrets. Step into our cozy character editor and uncover a wealth of choices, offering dozens of adorable combinations for your character's appearance. From clothing and eye colors to hairstyles and beyond, the possibilities are endless. Craft the magical character of your dreams - there are no limits.

















  • Select a body type
  • Opt for preferred clothes (regardless of gender)
  • Craft your face with a wide array of prefabricated elements, eye color, eyebrows (gender-neutral)
  • Nose and eye shape adapt based on your face selection
  • Determine your hair color (even combine two shades!)
  • Pick your skin tone
  • Select from a variety of accessories
  • Set your desired height
  • Design your own makeup
